mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sampleAppoint (appointId, clientId, companyName, productName, code, contactName, telephone, state, appointTime, comment) VALUES (#{appointId}, #{clientId}, #{companyName}, #{productName}, #{code}, #{contactName}, #{telephone}, #{state}, #{appointTime}, #{comment})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_sampleAppoint WHERE appointId LIKE "%"#{appointId}"%"
